name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2 Additional Content Pack 2 / コンテンツ追加パック２ / 內容補充包２
detailed_description:
This DLC will add the following items:
・Change Dungeon: Endless Zone
・Plan: Nurse Badge
・Plan: Tome of Darkness

It will also add the following content:
・Increase level cap by 300
・A new Colosseum battle is available

fullgame.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Sisters Generation / 超次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth2 / 超次次元遊戲 戰機少女 重生2

supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7(64bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7(64bit) or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
